meanings.definition: Consisting of various colors or elements
meanings.sent1: The clown wore the motleyest outfit with red, blue, and yellow patches.
meanings.sent2: The garden was a motleyest display of flowers in every shade imaginable.
meanings.sent3: The motleyest painting I've ever seen had a mix of colors that made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her personality was as motleyest as a rainbow, full of different traits and quirks.
meanings.sent5: The motleyest sunset painted the sky with hues of pink, orange, and purple.

meanings.sent1: The motleyest group of animals gathered at the watering hole.
meanings.sent2: The motleyest collection of books lined the shelves of the library.
meanings.sent3: The motleyest menu at the restaurant offered dishes from all around the world.
meanings.sent4: Her interests were as motleyest as they come, ranging from art to sports.
meanings.sent5: The motleyest crowd filled the stadium, cheering for different teams.
